title: SLAF launches ’Waga Sangramaya’
body_lines: The Sri Lanka Air Force (SLAF) men and women implemented the “Waga Sangramaya” within SLAF establishments which is affiliated by the SLAF Agriculture Unit in order to elevate the National Food Production drive as a matter of priority by launching many pragmatic remedies.
This project has started  to cultivate crops yielding a harvest in short term, increasing the amount of existing arable lands and establish new
